description:
Binary Holds are now making their hold packs out of recycled plastic, so future generations can enjoy getting a grip on our planet too.

Screw on edges to leave you smiling (or grimacing). Varying in size and positivity, these small holds can be used for both hands and feet.

  • Made from recycled ABS plastic
  • Comes with mounting hardware
name: Binary Holds Fat Lips Recycled 10 Crimp Hold Pack
